Reviews.Title: Look genuine
Reviews.Author: Simba
Reviews.Content: It comes complete with fake wires and it matches the real cameras in my Swannsecurity system. Very easy to install.

Reviews.Title: look just like the real thing
Reviews.Author: Young NYer 10
Reviews.Content: I installed these throughout my home and they look like the real thing. They even come with the audio/video cables attached to the camera.What I did was drill a hole in the mounting plate where it gets screwed to the house, cut the connectors off the ends and ran the wire through the hole. Make sure you tie a couple of knots on the wire so if someone tries to pull the wire out and tug on it, it wont and they will think that it is actually a wire being used to power the camera and record. Then you can tuck the wires behind the mounting plate, screw it to the house and your done.I will probably buy more as amazon was sold out. Couple these with a few camera signs and motion lights and you should have some added security to your property.In my honest opinion, unless you are monitering cameras 24/7, and can alert authorities if there is a break in, cameras are useless. The burglar can be in and out by the time your camera sends you a motion alert, you receive it, alert the cops and they arrive. A good 15-20 minutes can pass in that whole process. Now you got robbed and all you have is a photo of the burgler and now the cops have to count on him robbing the neighborhood again, catch him and be able to identify him.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera
Reviews.Author: Meg
Reviews.Content: Purchased this camera for outside our office. We placed it in the ceiling with the wires leading up through the tiles. It looks completely real and we haven't had anymore problems with people vandalizing our office door!

Reviews.Title: Projects a real look
Reviews.Author: Mario
Reviews.Content: It projects the image of a real camera.  Swann also provides window stickers proclaiming property under surveillance. Happy with this product until I find a practical surveillance system that records events in a cost effective way.

Reviews.Title: Camera "presence"
Reviews.Author: LA Mom
Reviews.Content: Just what our facility needed to "monitor" a vending machine area.Our problems have quickly stopped.  Nothing better than kids thinking they are on camera to improve behavior.

Reviews.Title: Super sturdy
Reviews.Author: B. Goyanes
Reviews.Content: These are REAL camera bodies without the guts. Fantastic.  Use them to add dummies to your system so that thieves will break fake ones that are in easier reach and miss your better hidden ones.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I was looking for
Reviews.Author: JCF Ohio
Reviews.Content: These are metal and look like real camera's, down to the wire coming out of them. They were exactly what I was looking for and I put them up in several places. The only complaint I have is that when I tightened one of the screws that hold the base swivel, it broke off. So not really high quality screws, I was able to put another screw in and it worked fine. I will buy these again if I have a need for more.

Reviews.Title: Good quality
Reviews.Author: Matto
Reviews.Content: Good quality for a fake. Goes well with my real cameras. I wish the red lights could light up at night like my real cameras do.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: mr.chinatown
Reviews.Content: These cameras are the real deal!  The actual case is made out of strong, durable metal housing.  I believe that these could be the actual cameras without the real "guts".  Highly recommend these as these look more realistic than the other, cheaply, looking plastic ones.  Real cameras don't have the "blinking" lights.  Easy to install, however, my only comment is that the mounting screws seem a bit long for the application.

Reviews.Title: just as advertised
Reviews.Author: jim blick
Reviews.Content: better than most than I've  seen advertised.  This really is the camera without the guts.  No light, but most I saw had the phony blinking light that real cameras don't have.  Good value.

Reviews.Title: Identical to real cameras
Reviews.Author: Ms. M
Reviews.Content: We have a set of 4 of the real cameras and purchased 2 imitation cameras to supplement that were placed in some fairly easy to spot locations.  These look identical to the real ones and with the wires there is no difference, well of course unless you view them at night and note there are no red lights in these.  However for the money and the deterrent we were looking for, we are very pleased.

Reviews.Title: Look like the real ones!!
Reviews.Author: Jd Creighton-lane
Reviews.Content: We bought these during the winter so we haven't installed them yet.  They look just like the real ones they sell at Sam's Club.  Good luck on the thief being able to tell the difference.  The bad thing is they only allowed us to buy 3.  We wanted 4 but that's okay we will deal with the 3 we got.

Reviews.Title: As advertised
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Keno"
Reviews.Content: After an office break in I wanted an inexpensive dummy camera to distract from my real system. This worked well.

Reviews.Title: Perfect addition to my actual security camera set
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Great product.  I added these as extras to my Swann Security camera set. The dummy cameras look identical to the "real" ones. Well worth the price.

Reviews.Title: Very good dummy camera. It's the real thing but without the innards.
Reviews.Author: Rick D. Lyons
Reviews.Content: Looks real.feels real.even has a cable running from it. This is not plastic.its metal.real glass and lens. That's why I bought another one and will buy more.

Reviews.Title: Dummy ADS-180
Reviews.Author: Paula Praed
Reviews.Content: Would have been perfect if it had a blinking LED light run by a battery.  Otherwise a great looking camera, well built and sturdy.

Reviews.Title: An exact replica of the real thing.
Reviews.Author: Johnathen Mitchell
Reviews.Content: Pros: Exact replica of an actual Swann ADS-180.Cons: Very discreet, so might not be noticed by potential threats. (this can also be a pro, as the more obvious cameras might raise suspicions (to being fake).Overall it's a high quality die-cast metal camera dummy and it suits my purposes quite well.

Reviews.Title: So convincing, my installer put two of these in places where we wanted real cameras.
Reviews.Author: Matt Jones
Reviews.Content: These dummy cameras do exactly what they're supposed to do.  They look like their real counterpart in every way.  I ended up having to deliver the bad news to my installer that he'd put this dummy camera in a location designated for the live one.  These are great to save some money installing in difficult to wire areas or places where you want some kind of deterrent but don't have an extra camera to install.

Reviews.Title: Looks 100% legit!
Reviews.Author: Philip, San Jose CA
Reviews.Content: Comes in surprisingly professional packaging and includes 4  window stickers too!  All the mounting hardware is included and looks just like my real ones. I used this one to put in plain view to act as a deterrent so that if a criminal wants to damage this one, that's fine by me.  Bought on Amazon for $13 but saw on Fry's electronics ad today for $14 with $4 instant savings and $5 mail in rebate!

Reviews.Title: Look real...and hope it does the job...
Reviews.Author: James B. Williams
Reviews.Content: I put this on my boat...looks great and real..hope it keeps the dishonest people away..time will tell..but I would recommend the products..

Reviews.Title: A high quality metal camera body that looks real. Not a flimsy plastic contraption.
Reviews.Author: GeorgiaGeekGuy
Reviews.Content: A high quality metal camera body that looks real. Not a flimsy plastic contraption.Pros:* REAL metal camera body (minus the electronic guts).* Looks just like the real (working) SWAN cameras.* Real cable, so you can 'wire it up' realistically if desired.* Came with several Swan 'security' stickers, IF you want to place on your windows/doors.* NO blinking LED lights (REAL cameras don't do that; blinking red almost always means 'fake' to a crook!)* Easy to adjust to point to any angle.Cons:* Screws were cheap quality and the heads nearly stripped when screwing them in. You may need to substitute your own higher quality screws.I recommend mixing 'fake' cams like these among real ones, if possible. Don't depend entirely on fake cameras. The crooks won't know which are live and which are not. The use of the window stickers is up to you; Swan makes many actual security systems, so the stickers might be a good deterrent.-1 star for cheap screws. Otherwise perfect for my needs.

ProductInfo.Features:
Dummy Camera Identical To The Real Thing
Mount To Walls Or Ceilings
Visible Deterrent
The product comes with wire
ProductInfo.Name: Swann Dummy ADS-180 Imitation Security Camera
